sections.name: Worm Prophet
sections.text: This creature did not include a description.

link.name: Night of the Gray Death pg. 47
link.alt: Night of the Gray Death pg. 47

link.name: Night of the Gray Death pg. 47
link.alt: Night of the Gray Death pg. 47

traits.name: Rare
traits.text: This rarity indicates that a rules element is very difficult to find in the game world. A rare feat, spell, item or the like is available to players only if the GM decides to include it in the game, typically through discovery during play. Creatures with this trait are rare. They typically can't be summoned. The DC of Recall Knowledge checks related to these creatures is increased by 5.

traits.name: Lawful
traits.text: Lawful effects often manipulate energy from law-aligned Outer Planes and are antithetical to chaotic divine servants or divine servants of chaotic deities. A creature with this trait is lawful in alignment.

traits.name: Evil
traits.text: Evil effects often manipulate energy from evil-aligned Outer Planes and are antithetical to good divine servants or divine servants of good deities. A creature with this trait is evil in alignment.

traits.name: Human
traits.text: A creature with this trait is a member of the human ancestry. Humans are a diverse array of people known for their adaptability. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by humans.

traits.name: Humanoid
traits.text: Humanoid creatures reason and act much like humans. They typically stand upright and have two arms and two legs.

link.name: Night of the Gray Death pg. 47
link.alt: Night of the Gray Death pg. 47

automatic_abilities.name: Anonymity
automatic_abilities.text: The Worm Prophet enforcer has a +2 circumstance bonus to Deception checks and saving throws to conceal their identity and a +2 circumstance bonus to their Deception DC against effects that ferret out information about the Gray Gardener's identity.

automatic_abilities.name: Invaded
automatic_abilities.text: The worm prophet is subject to the conqueror worm's Mental Invader effect.

automatic_abilities.name: Requirements
automatic_abilities.effect: The Gray Gardener assassin takes 3d8 mental damage, and the saving throw is a success.
automatic_abilities.text: The Worm Prophet features are obscured by a mask or hood;

reactive_abilities.name: Gardener's Resolve
reactive_abilities.trigger: The Worm Prophet rolls a failure (but not a critical failure on a Will save against an effect with the mental or fear trait)

traits.name: Agile
traits.text: The multiple attack penalty you take with this weapon on the second attack on your turn is –4 instead of –5, and –8 instead of –10 on the third and subsequent attacks in the turn.

traits.name: Versatile
traits.text: A versatile weapon can be used to deal a different type of damage than that listed in the Damage entry. This trait indicates the alternate damage type. For instance, a piercing weapon that is versatile S can be used to deal piercing or slashing damage. You choose the damage type each time you make an attack.

traits.name: Agile
traits.text: The multiple attack penalty you take with this weapon on the second attack on your turn is –4 instead of –5, and –8 instead of –10 on the third and subsequent attacks in the turn.

traits.name: Thrown
traits.text: You can throw this weapon as a ranged attack, and it is a ranged weapon when thrown. A thrown weapon adds your Strength modifier to damage just like a melee weapon does. When this trait appears on a melee weapon, it also includes the range increment. Ranged weapons with this trait use the range increment specified in the weapon’s Range entry.

traits.name: Versatile
traits.text: A versatile weapon can be used to deal a different type of damage than that listed in the Damage entry. This trait indicates the alternate damage type. For instance, a piercing weapon that is versatile S can be used to deal piercing or slashing damage. You choose the damage type each time you make an attack.

ability.name: Capture Spirit
ability.trigger: A target affected by one of the worm prophet's necromancy spells dies within 60 feet of the worm prophet
ability.effect: The worm prophet harnesses a bit of the departing victim's soul, and the worm prophet is quickened 1 for 1 minute. They can use this extra action only to Step, Stride, or Sustain a Spell.

ability.name: Steady Spellcasting
ability.text: If a reaction would disrupt the worm prophet's spellcasting action, the worm prophet attempts a DC 15 flat check. On a success, the action isn't disrupted.
